story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a seasoned digital communications professional with a decade-long journey in the ever-evolving world of digital media. Their story began at George Mason University, where they earned their B.A. in Communication in 2006, laying the foundation for what would become a dynamic career.

Fresh out of college, they cut their teeth as a reporter covering commercial real estate, quickly proving their worth and earning a promotion within their first year. Their writing prowess led them to a more challenging role reporting on the complexities of the accounting profession, where they found themselves walking the halls of Congress, covering the House Financial Services Committee and Senate Banking Committee. Here, they developed a deep understanding of tax law and regulations that would serve them well in future roles.

By 2012, they had evolved into a Communications Specialist, where they became the guardian of organizational messaging, ensuring consistency across all platforms. They crafted everything from annual reports to marketing materials, while simultaneously diving into the emerging world of social media campaigns.

Their career reached new heights in 2015 when they stepped into their current role as a Digital Communications Specialist. Here, they've become a master of multiple disciplines, managing social media accounts for the Social Security Administration's Ticket to Work program and ensuring digital accessibility compliance. They've become fluent in the language of technology, working closely with IT departments to translate complex subject matter into clear, engaging content.

Throughout their journey, they've built an impressive toolkit of skills, from mastering AP Style and Microsoft Office to becoming proficient in digital marketing tools like Google Analytics and Hootsuite Sprout Social. They're equally comfortable crafting technical documents or creative content, and their experience with Adobe Creative Suite allows them to add visual elements to their storytelling.

Now, they're ready for their next chapter, seeking an opportunity to apply their wealth of experience while continuing to grow in the dynamic field of digital communications.
